text.title: Wikinews interviews Australian disability standing skier Jonty O'Callaghan

head.s: Wikinews interviews Australian disability standing skier Jonty O'Callaghan

caption.s: interviews Australian Paralympic skier Jonty O'Callaghan

p.s:
Recently ,
Wikinews
spent time with with
Australian
Paralympic
skier
Jonty O'Clallaghan who was in
Copper Mountain
,
Colorado
for the
IPC
Nor-Am Cup .
Nor-Am Cup , and you 're a fifteen-year-old ?
Yup .
Yeah , I 've been skiing since I was about ten and I really enjoy racing .

I talked to your father , he said you 're
kind of
thinking
Sochi
?
It 's the matter of if I qualify by getting enough good races and points .
How do you balance skiing with doing school ?

Over the past few years in Australia I 've been doing full time in tenth grade in the Australian winter , which means the school at the mountain brings up my work from my home school in
Melbourne
to do up at the mountain when I 'm not skiing .
Since you 're not on the development team , do you get enough support or your parents are supporting this ?
Yeah , my parents support me all the way .
I 've never doubted their support always though the journeys and I [ thank them ] for their support throughout and continuing through my journeys .

What
classification
are you ?

I am
LW9-1
.
What does that mean for people who know nothing about classification ?
I basically have a disability on the right side of my body .
Yep .
which weakens two of my limbs and which means I favor my left side a lot more .
Did you have that from birth ?
Yeah , it was caused by premature birth .
Do you do any other sports anything other than skiing or are you one of those Australian ski bunnies ?

I 've done a lot of sports doing my journey , I 've always played
cricket
,
Australian football
, played a little
tennis
, and I like
golf
too as a hobby .
Are you going to and be one of those dual Paralympians for Winter and Summer ?
No , because I do n't think any other sports
I like are in the Summer Olympics .
I think I 'll pursue them after I finished my skiing career , because cricket you can do when you 're much older .
Is there anything else people should know about you ?
Yeah , I 'm just looking forward to the future and hoping for the best and maybe some medals .
Okay cool , thank you very much .

Bidgee
